title: Migrate TUI to ratatui framework
description:
Replace current custom TUI implementation (src/tui/) with ratatui framework for a better terminal UI experience.

## Current State
- Custom TUI in src/tui/ with renderer.rs, spinner.rs, stats.rs, diff.rs, components.rs
- Basic terminal output with spinners and diff display

## Goals
- Interactive, responsive terminal UI
- Better layout management and widget composition
- Improved diff visualization
- Progress indicators and status displays
- Potential for real-time updates during LLM optimization

## References
- Ratatui docs: https://ratatui.rs/
- Example apps: https://ratatui.rs/examples/apps/
